note.text: Since glibc 2.9, the glibc DNS client side resolver is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow when the getaddrinfo() library function is used.
note.title: Summary

note.text: Software using this function may be exploited with attacker-controlled domain names, attacker-controlled DNS servers, or through a man-in-the-middle attack.
note.title: Impact

note.text: The following products are confirmed to be not affected: FortiOS FortiSwitch FortiAnalyzer FortiManager FortiMail Fortibridge FortiAuthenticator Meru FortiMom FortiDirector FortiPrivateCloud FortiCache FortiClient FortiRecorder FortiCore Other products are in the course of being investigated.
